title: 1999/246/EC: Commission Decision of 30 March 1999 approving certain contingency plans for the control of classical swine fever (notified under document number C(1999) 769) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 30 March 1999
approving certain contingency plans for the control of classical swine fever
(notified under document number C(1999) 769)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/246/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The contingency plans for the control of classical swine fever submitted by the Member States listed in Annex I are approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
